full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: That's very considerate of you . And now , shall we discuss the insurance terms ? Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: I suppose the additional premium for the special coverage is for the buyer's account .
response_1: We generally insure W . P . ( W . P . A ) on a C . I . F . offer . Special risks , such as TEND ( Theft , Pilferage and Non-delivery ) , leakage , breakage , oil , freshwater , etc . can also be covered upon request .

There's our standard coverage at XXXXXXX% of the shipment value, and we also have special coverage available which provides additional protection for XXXXXXX. The special coverage does carry an additional premium of XXXXXXX%.
